description: A noodle recipe packed with a nutty and creamy chicken sauce.
name: Chicken Satay Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g noodles, cooked as per packet instructions
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the peanut oil.
Fry the chicken for 10 minutes while turning.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and continue to fry for a further 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pan and combine fully.
Bring the dish to the boil while stirring and then bring to a simmer for 15 minutes.
Cook the noodles as per packet instructions and then drain and set to one side.
Once the sauce has started to reduce and thicken, remove from the heat and serve on a bed of noodles.
